text: vah khuda (har aib se) paak va paakeeza hai jisane apane bandon ko raaton raat masjidul haraam (khaan ai kaaba) se masjidul aqasa (aasamaanee masjid) tak kee sair karaee jisake chaugird hamane har kism kee barakat muhayya kar rakhee hain taaki ham usako (apanee kudarat kee) nishaaniyaan dikhae isamen shaq nahin ki (vah sab kuchh) sunata (aur) dekhata hai
